pageTitle: Sincerely Jules Dry Clean Only Tee | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 27in / 68.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Wash cold. 100% cotton. Fabric: Jersey. Crisp 'Dry Clean Only' lettering adds a graphic touch to a slouchy Sincerely Jules tee, styled with a casual crew neckline. Short sleeves. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer LA-based vintage-lover, stylist, and self-described "creative type" Julie Sarinana started her fashion blog, Sincerely, Jules, in February 2009 while studying visual communications at FIDM. Inspired by her blog and seeking a new outlet to express her creative ideas, Sarinana launched her namesake brand in spring 2013. Playing off her signature eclectic, effortless style, the laid-back line focuses on casual tees with graphic illustrations and inspirational sayings, including her personal motto: "Dream, Believe, Achieve." See all Sincerely Jules reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
